category.name: RAC
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_Hide_Perform_Task_Command_ToolAndInfo
preference.preference_description: Deactivates the visibility of the "Perform Task" command in the "Tool and Information" area in Active Workspace for Workflow types for which the associated stylesheet defines the command presentation in the middle area (out-of-the-box for Tasks and Task Signoffs). Valid values are: * true: the command is only visible in the middle area for the above-mentioned Workflow types. This is the default value. * false: the command is visible in the middle area and also in the "Tool and Information" area.
